devdoc.details: Intended for Hackathon MVP. Implements Yellow Network-style state channel logic simplified.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

abortSession(bytes32).details: unique to MVP, allows manual closing.

params._amount: The amount of USDC to lock for this session.

returns.sessionId: The unique identifier for the session.

params._amounts: List of amounts for each recipient.
params._recipients: List of addresses to receive tips.
params._sessionId: The ID of the session to settle.
params._signature: The signature of the creator confirming this distribution.

devdoc.title: TipFlowSession

abortSession(bytes32).notice: Allows creator to withdraw funds if no tips were sent, without a signature (simplified for MVP).

createSession(uint256).notice: Starts a tipping session by locking USDC.

settleSession(bytes32,address[],uint256[.notice: Settles a session by verifying the off-chain "final state" signature and distributing funds.

userdoc.notice: Validates off-chain tipping sessions and handles on-chain settlement.
